name: FX Inside-Bar Volume Breakout
description: Intraday price-action breakout strategy for EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY and AUD/USD on 15-minute bars. It enters trades only between 07:00-17:00 UTC when an inside-bar pattern breaks its parent high/low with volume ≥120 % of the 50-bar average. Positions are sized to risk 1 % of equity, with a fixed 0.3 % stop-loss and 0.6 % take-profit (2R target).
